short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks the availability of a sitemap for the active domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sitemap Checker enables users to locate and extract data from sitemaps with ease. Whether you're looking to analyze a single sitemap or pull data from multiple sitemaps for comprehensive coverage, Sitemap Checker has you covered. With just a few clicks, you can uncover sitemap URLs, extract the relevant data, and even export the results to CSV format for further analysis.

Key Features:

- Quick Sitemap Locator: Instantly finds and displays the sitemap URL for the active webpage.
- Multi-Sitemap Extraction: Supports extracting data from multiple sitemap URLs, ensuring comprehensive data coverage across all available sitemaps.
- Automated CSV Export: Saves extracted data in a structured CSV format with dynamically generated headers, allowing easy integration with other tools.

For any questions, suggestions, or bug reports, please reach out to us at kontakt@wentago.pl.

If you find Sitemap Checker helpful, consider supporting its development with a donation here -> https://buymeacoffee.com/skolmowski.
